Backgrid.Extension.ColumnManagerVisibilityControl Class

Extends Backbone.View
Defined in: /home/wilbert/github/backgrid-columnmanager/src/Backgrid.ColumnManager.js:636
Module: Backgrid.ColumnManager

UI control which manages visibility of columns. Inspired by: https://github.com/kjantzer/backbonejs-dropdown-view.
